description: This file defines the 'dijon' namespace and the 'dijon.System' class, which implements a dependency injection and event handling system for JavaScript applications.

classes.name: dijon.System
classes.description: A class providing dependency injection, outlet mapping, and event handling functionalities.

methods.name: _createAndSetupInstance
methods.description: Creates an instance of a class and injects dependencies based on system mappings.

methods.name: _retrieveFromCacheOrCreate
methods.description: Retrieves a singleton or creates a new instance of a class based on mappings.

methods.name: mapOutlet
methods.description: Defines an outlet point in a target object for a mapped source key.

methods.name: getObject
methods.description: Retrieves or creates an object mapped to a specific key.

methods.name: mapValue
methods.description: Maps a specific value to a key, optionally auto-mapping it as an outlet.

methods.name: hasMapping
methods.description: Checks if a key is mapped in the system.

methods.name: mapClass
methods.description: Maps a class constructor to a key for instantiation.

methods.name: mapSingleton
methods.description: Maps a class as a singleton to a key.

methods.name: instantiate
methods.description: Forces instantiation of the class mapped to a key, returning the instance.

methods.name: injectInto
methods.description: Performs dependency injection into an object's mapped outlets.

methods.name: unmap
methods.description: Removes a key mapping from the system.

methods.name: unmapOutlet
methods.description: Removes an outlet mapping from a target object.

methods.name: mapHandler
methods.description: Maps a handler function to an event/route.

methods.name: unmapHandler
methods.description: Removes a handler mapping from an event/route.

methods.name: notify
methods.description: Calls all handlers mapped to a specific event/route, passing arguments.
